name: Spy of Deimos
detailed_description:
Deimos is the natural satellite of Pluto which is far away from the earth and now becoming the headquarter of Sorova, the illegal company which has been trying to build a forbidden weapon called Orbeam. You must destroy their facility from the inside and manipulate the robots they built.

Features

  • Face and avoid 5 types of robotic enemies to reach the Exit door.
  • 50 levels of stages to solve.
about_the_game:
Deimos is the natural satellite of Pluto which is far away from the earth and now becoming the headquarter of Sorova, the illegal company which has been trying to build a forbidden weapon called Orbeam. You must destroy their facility from the inside and manipulate the robots they built.

Features

  • Face and avoid 5 types of robotic enemies to reach the Exit door.
  • 50 levels of stages to solve.
short_description: Take control of Greg, an intergalactic spy who possesses the newest teleportation technology. Your mission is to espionage Sorova, an illegal company which has been trying to build a forbidden weapon to destroy the earth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3, 32-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
